commentary: Chahal to Liton Das, OUT run-out at the non-striker's end! This is chaos! Liton has belted a lovely drive that would have pierced the off-side ring if the fielder at extra cover wasn't Jadeja. He has gone flying to his left, despite a seemingly bad bounce that was making the ball rise, and collected cleanly. In the meantime, Liton has been ball-watching as Mithun has taken off. Jadeja is quickly back up, shapes to throw at the striker's end, but maintains his composure and stops. Finds the non-striker's end is the way to go and sends in a throw on the bounce. Stunning, stunning work. it's what you expect of him. But where was the calling from Liton?
